title: Vieira (Francisco)
body:
A Madeiran poet who died in Funchal, at the age of about 40, on November 13, 1889. He collaborated in some Madeiran newspapers and especially in the periodical
> A Verdade
 , and published the
> Album Madeirense
 , poetry by different authors
(Funchal, 1884),
> Prelúdios poéticos e Petalas
 (Funchal, 1887).
